channel.title: Runescape is GAY!
channel.description: I hate runescape it is just scamming you out of money for members, I haven't been a mem and never will. I quit a long time ago. Who agrees that runescape is gay even before all these updates. I hate it and never will go back...And people if you want a server thats like runescape just play fucking runescape!

item.title: Runescape is GAY!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:12, topic:187235”]It can be used in both sense, Taharok. We have old English, we have 90’s English, now we have modern. Which consist of destroying everything our country has attempted to make sense to us.
Hah.

anyways, to be ontopic, runescape bset.[/quote]

The day I see ‘old English’ used often is the day that post beats mine. We speak American english which consists of slang words. Slang words are simply phrases/expressions and single words we have made up/twist the original definitions to our own definition. That’s how we speak and that is how everyone will always speak a language (depending on the time, obviously).

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape is GAY!
item.dc:creator: @Skating_On_Java Elite2142
item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:

[quote=“haticks, post:14, topic:187235”][quote author=Elite2142 link=topic=249785.msg2101297#msg2101297 date=1205195940]
runescape isnt gay

but whoever made it done a really crap job, the graphics, the play everything just pisses me off when i play it

apart from when i was on for 48 hours with coffee and red bull, and got bored and went around saying free stuff, and had about 10000 follows, then got banned
[/quote]Yeah i bet, even though the max anount of players on a server is 2000[/quote]

I hax.

sarcasm?

i litrally had around 100 people
